cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to 0 will cause SCTP connection failures as at least one stream is required.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_frequencyBand to 999, which is outside the valid NR frequency band range, will cause frequency configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_frequencyBand 設定為 999，這超出有效的 NR 頻率頻段範圍，會導致頻率配置錯誤。
